name: H4Xx0r
description:
Description

This game was made by the Half-Ass Studios team during Global Game Jam 2018. (my first ever game jam!) I the game was made in Processing, a java based coding environment. 

Link to the game's Half-Ass Studios itch.io page: https://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fhalf-ass-studios.itch.io%2Fh4xx0r&h...

Link to the game's page on Global Game Jam: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/h4xx0r-0

Installation
  1. Download the zip
  2. Unzip files somewhere
  3. Run the executable for your windows version (64 bit or 32 bit)
  4. Hack your heart away!
